text: Vanesa Capo Perez (born October 3, 1982 in Balearic Islands) is a swimmer from Spain. She has a disability: she has cerebral palsy and is an S6 type swimmer. She raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. She raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. She finished second in the 4 x 50 meter Relay 20pts race. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S6
title: Vanesa Capo Perez
